howtomodel.title: Copy images to your computer?
howtomodel.intro: This step-by-step guide will explain to you how to copy images from a memory stick to your computer.

stepmodel.intro: First, you need to plug in your memory stick.
stepmodel.content: To do so, insert your memory stick (USB, memory card...) inside one of your computer slots.

Hit Windows+E (both keys at the same time). A new window appears. Then locate your memory stick in the opened window (should appear below the Disk Drives, in the left panel). Double-click on its icon to open its content.
Once the content is displayed, select the pictures you want to copy onto your computer. You can select them all (See step 4) or only a range (See step 5).
To do so, simply hit Crtl+A (both keys at the same time).

stepmodel.intro: Select only a range of pictures.
stepmodel.content: To do so, simply maintain the key Crtl pressed and then click on each picture you want to select.
To do so, simply hit Crtl+C (both keys at the same time).
Hit Windows+E (both keys at the same time). A new window appears. Then locate your Pictures folder. Double-click on its icon to open its content.
To do so, simply hit Crtl+V (both keys at the same time).
This is it, you've copied your pictures from your memory stick to your computer. Congratulations!

howtomodel.title: Publish your pictures online?
howtomodel.intro: This step-by-step guide will explain to you how to upload images from your computer to Google+ (using Picasa) and share them with your friends and family.

stepmodel.content:
Double click on the Picasa icon, or look for it in:
  1. Start
  2. Programs
  3. Picasa
Don't have Picasa yet? Obtain it from the following link:

stepmodel.intro: Then, you need to locate the folder you want to share.
stepmodel.content: As Picasa keeps up-to-date with the pictures on your computer, you should be able to locate all folders containing pictures. Select the folder that interests you.
Once the content is displayed, select the pictures you want to upload online. You can select them all (See step 4) or only a range (See step 5).
To do so, simply hit Crtl+A (both keys at the same time).

stepmodel.intro: Select only a range of pictures.
stepmodel.content: To do so, simply maintain the key Crtl pressed and then click on each picture you want to select.
To do so, simply hit the Share button in Picasa. You can then enter some details, such as the album name. And select which persons you want to share the album with (enter a name or an email address).

This is it, you've uploaded your pictures to Google+. They are now accessible directly in your Google+ profile. And the persons you have shared the album with have received a notification by email to check your photos. Congratulations!
